benchmark_config.jira_title: Implement/Test API: GET /1.0/kb/bundles - Retrieve a bundle by external key

covered: Valid Request: Happy-path retrieval by externalKey returns 200 with application/json and correct array semantics (single element when unique).
Empty Response: Not-found conditions return 404 (non-existent key, empty DB, deleted bundle when explicitly excluded).
Query Parameters: Robust coverage of includedDeleted (true/false), audit enum (FULL/MINIMAL/NONE), missing/empty/invalid values, and unsupported params handling.
Authorization: 401 (no token) and 403 (insufficient permissions) scenarios included.
Error Handling/Resilience: Service/database downtime returning 503 covered; transient failure with retry covered.
Security/Validation: SQL injection, XSS, unexpected input formats, non-ASCII keys, min/max length boundaries included.
Performance/Scalability: Response time assertion and large dataset presence; multiple matching bundles (array of results) covered.
Response Schema: Validation that Bundle contains required fields and deleted flag behavior validated.
gaps: Pagination: No scenarios validating pagination behavior or confirming its absence (e.g., no paging params/headers) when multiple results are returned.
Rate Limiting: No tests for throttling (e.g., 429 Too Many Requests) or Retry-After headers under burst traffic.
Caching Behavior: No validation of caching headers (ETag/Last-Modified/Cache-Control) or conditional GET (If-None-Match/If-Modified-Since -> 304).
Default includedDeleted behavior: Missing an explicit test that omitting includedDeleted (default false) excludes deleted bundles (deleted resource with no flag -> 404).
Default audit behavior: No explicit assertion that omitting audit yields default NONE (no audit fields) on success.
Server error variety: 500 Internal Server Error path (unexpected exception) not covered; only 503 is tested.
recommendations: Add pagination-focused scenarios: verify absence or presence of pagination. If unsupported, assert no paging headers/params and that all matches are returned; if supported, validate page/size, next/prev links, and total counts.
Introduce rate-limiting tests: burst concurrent requests to trigger 429, assert Retry-After and proper backoff behavior.
Add caching tests: assert ETag/Last-Modified and Cache-Control on 200; send If-None-Match/If-Modified-Since to validate 304 Not Modified.
Add a scenario for a deleted bundle without includedDeleted parameter to confirm 404 due to default includedDeleted=false.
Add a scenario that omits audit and asserts no audit fields are present, confirming default audit=NONE.
Include a scenario simulating an unexpected server exception returning 500 with a safe, non-leaky error body schema.
